purpose: To provide a framework for deploying AI applications locally with customizable backend features using personal OpenAI keys.
principle: Built on JavaScript, it integrates with OpenAI APIs to enable local deployment and customization of AI applications.
reusability: Designed for local deployment, allowing users to integrate their own OpenAI keys and extend backend functionality.
limitations: Requires users to have their own OpenAI key, and may have limitations in terms of scalability and cloud integration.
name: ai2apps
description: Setup AI2Apps at local system so you can use your own OpenAI key or make more back-end features.
highlight: Allows users to set up and customize AI2Apps locally with their own OpenAI key for enhanced backend features.
